alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 9:17AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...SNOW SQUALL... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 916 AM MST, a snow squall was along a line extending from 15 miles north of Hayden to 6 miles west of Rifle and moving east at 30 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Silt around 945 AM MST. New Castle around 955 AM MST. Steamboat Springs around 1010 AM MST. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 82 and 135. U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 85 and 147. Colorado 13 between mile markers 1 and 26, between mile markers 52 and 53, and between mile markers 68 and 112. Colorado 82 between mile markers 1 and 9. Colorado 131 between mile markers 36 and 68. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
